headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' translate.google.com *.googleapis.com *.gstatic.com blob:; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' translate.google.com *.googleapis.com *.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' translate.google.com *.googleapis.com *.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: *.googleapis.com *.gstatic.com *.google.com; connect-src 'self' *.googleapis.com *.google.com; worker-src 'self' blob:; frame-src 'self' translate.google.com; object-src 'none';
